name: Planet Artillery
description:
Small, one-level, planet-shooter game. You're in charge of a 'death star' that is teleported into a solar system. Controlled by mouse. Make the first shot to start the battle.

Game limitations: no more than 4 NPC planets in the system.

Other than that, game-improvement ideas are welcomed :)

Credits to music authors:

-  “Space (Outro)” by Andy G. Cohen (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Andy_G_Cohen/Through_The_Lens/Andy_G_Cohen_-_Space_Outro)

- "The Arcade Game" by Komiku (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Poupis_incredible_adventures_/Komiku_-_Poupis_incredible_adventures__-_29_Poupi_Great_Adventures_-_The_Arcade_Game)

- "Wherever Aliens!!!" by sawsquarenoise. (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/RottenMage_SpaceJacked/12_1116)
